name: Military Truck Cargo Simulator
description:
You are the king of this game, prove yourself to the world, and let the world know about your hidden skills to tackle problems and hindrance overcoming, driving a Military Vehicle is not at a difficult task for you, as you have already been playing many racing and drifting games in the recent times, the basic target here should be to park the Military Vehicle right in its place, with no error in parking lot, in order to gain maximum marks in form of scores or points, the more points you earn, the more are the chances that you can upgrade your vehicle faster and can buy a good one. Army Truck Transport: Military Vehicle Parking involves realistic graphics and real break, clutch sounds will add up in the amusement and pleasure of this game.

How to Play Army Truck Transport: Military Vehicle Parking:

• Touch on the move button for race
• Touch break button to stop the Military Vehicle
• Touch the button of reverse in case you want to move the Military Vehicle back
• For right and left turns touch respective sides
• Park the Military Vehicle in given area

This parking game brings in many missions and challenges that you have to overcome, every new stage is a bit difficult and more addictive than the previous, you will surely love to play this and once you have started playing, it will be really difficult for you to leave in midway, as it has multiple interesting levels ahead, start the rush now!

Features of Army Truck Transport: Military Vehicle Parking:

• Multiple challenging vehicles to drive in
• Improve your driving skills and learn to park a wide range of vehicles
• Mission based intuitive gameplay
• Rotate the wheel to move on either side, use reverse, race and break controls
• Multiple cameras-including a First Person drivers eye view
• Unlock multiple Military Vehicles available with the help of coins earned
• Realistic driving and parking experience
• Amazing 3D Graphics
• Free to install and play
• Challenging levels to test you’re driving skills.
